meanings.definition: Existing or occurring in the same geographic area
meanings.sent1: The two bird species were sympatrically found in the same forest.
meanings.sent2: Many plants and animals coexist sympatrically in this ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The sympatrically located trees seemed to be having a neighborhood party.
meanings.sent4: The houses on the street stood sympatrically, creating a harmonious sight.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed sympatrically, painting the landscape with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: Living in the same habitat without geographic separation
meanings.sent1: The sympatrically nesting birds shared the same tree.
meanings.sent2: These sympatrically dwelling animals have adapted well to their environment.
meanings.sent3: The sympatrically residing squirrels threw a nutty gathering in the park.
meanings.sent4: The sympatrically settled fish swam together in perfect unison.
meanings.sent5: The sympatrically cohabiting insects worked together to build their nest.

meanings.definition: Inhabiting the same region without physical barriers
meanings.sent1: The sympatrically located tribes interacted peacefully.
meanings.sent2: These sympatrically living species share resources effectively.
meanings.sent3: The sympatrically positioned animals organized a community picnic.
meanings.sent4: The sympatrically situated mountains stood tall in unity.
meanings.sent5: The sympatrically existing plants intertwined their roots for support.
